meanings.definition: A temporary protrusion of the surface of an amoeboid cell for movement and feeding.
meanings.sent1: The amoeba extended a pseudopod to reach its food.
meanings.sent2: The pseudopod helped the amoeba move towards its prey.
meanings.sent3: The playful amoeba used its pseudopod to give its friend a gentle poke.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was like a pseudopod, reaching out to help those in need.
meanings.sent5: The pseudopod of the amoeba was like a tiny arm, grasping at its meal.

meanings.definition: A false or deceptive appearance or impression.
meanings.sent1: The magician created a pseudopod of smoke to distract the audience.
meanings.sent2: The pseudopod of kindness hid his true intentions.
meanings.sent3: The fake smile was like a pseudopod, fooling everyone around.
meanings.sent4: Her words formed a pseudopod of lies, wrapping around the truth.
meanings.sent5: The pseudopod of deceit slowly unraveled, revealing the truth beneath.
